participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

sit_scr_event.Description: Event selected by RA if not 2-year follow-up

sit_scr_script_elapsedtime.Description:
script.elapsedtime:

Time it took to run script (in ms)

sit_scr_computer_platform.Description:
computer.platform:

The platform the script was run on

sit_scr_expr_mrt_initialrat.Description:
expressions.meanRT_initialRating:

Mean reaction time (in ms) of submitting initial rating after onset of rating scale

sit_scr_expr_mrt_finalrat.Description:
expressions.meanRT_finalRating:

Mean reaction time (in ms) of submitting final rating after onset of rating scale

Note: 
positive values => final rating was higher than initial rating
negative values => final rating was lower than initial rating

sit_scr_expr_mratdiff1.Description:
expressions.meanRatingDiff1:

The mean difference in ratings (final - initial) for peer rating condition '-4'

Note: positive values => final rating was higher than initial ratingnegative values => final rating was lower than initial rating

sit_scr_expr_mratdiff2.Description:
expressions.meanRatingDiff2:

The mean difference in ratings (final - initial) for peer rating condition '-2'

Note: positive values => final rating was higher than initial ratingnegative values => final rating was lower than initial rating

sit_scr_expr_mratdiff3.Description:
expressions.meanRatingDiff3:

The mean difference in ratings (final - initial) for peer rating condition '+2'

Note: positive values => final rating was higher than initial ratingnegative values => final rating was lower than initial rating

sit_scr_expr_mratdiff4.Description:
expressions.meanRatingDiff4:

The mean difference in ratings (final - initial) for peer rating condition '+4'

Note: positive values => final rating was higher than initial ratingnegative values => final rating was lower than initial rating

sit_scr_values_count1.Description:
values.count1:

Counts the number peer rating condition '-4' was run

sit_scr_values_count2.Description:
values.count2:

Counts the number peer rating condition '-2' was run

sit_scr_values_count3.Description:
values.count3:

Counts the number peer rating condition '+2' was run

sit_scr_values_count4.Description:
values.count4:

Counts the number peer rating condition '+4' was run

sit_scr_values_countnr_initial.Description:
values.countNR_initial:

Counts the number of 'no response' for initial rating trials

sit_scr_values_countnr_final.Description:
values.countNR_final:

Counts the number of 'no response' for final rating trials
